statements: UPDATE census_data SET age = 30, occupation = 'Engineer' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE census_data SET gender = 'Female', first_name = 'Emily' WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
UPDATE census_data SET age = 35, occupation = 'Engineer' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE census_data SET first_name = 'Alice', last_name = 'Smith', gender = 'Female' WHERE age > 40
UPDATE census_data SET population = population + 1000 WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
UPDATE demographics SET population_count = population_count - 100 WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND state = 'CA' AND age_group = 'Adults';
UPDATE census_data SET population = 100000, median_income = 75000 WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY'
UPDATE demographics SET population_count = 50000 WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND state = 'CA' AND age_group = '18-30'
UPDATE public.census_data SET gender = 'Male', age = 30 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE public.population_stats SET unemployment_rate = 4.7, median_income = 65000.00 WHERE area_id = 2005;

UPDATE regions SET population = 1000000, median_income = 60000 WHERE region_name = 'Midwest';
